Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'Request connection to root server... Request connection to root server...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "It won't work. We've cut off all contact between your sub-terminals and the root server.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Huaxu', 3: '...Disconnection confirmed. Withdrawing connection request to the root server.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'You have... no authority... to issue that order.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Much like "Bianca" before, Huaxu disintegrates before your eyes.'}
{3: 'Asimov has turned on his comms, but he does not respond to your question.'}
{3: 'From the terminal screen, you can see he is moving something with Karenina.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "...Looks like they're too busy to answer us.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Let's find out what the status of the virtual space is.", 4: '3'}
{3: 'Liv leans over and picks something off the ground.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'This is on the ground after Huaxu disappeared...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv holds a peculiar fragment in her hand.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Why did it drop this... when the other one...', 4: '2'}
{2: "You're right. That one didn't drop anything.", 3: '43'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's a set of coordinates, but I can't decipher the last two data points.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Maybe the fragment was solidified with the core of the sub-terminal, and it was damaged when the core disintegrated.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'How accurate are the coordinates you can retrieve?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I can narrow it down to an area of about five to ten square kilometers.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'About time we hear back from you.', 3: '56'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'We just finished preparations for you to leave the virtual space.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "We've managed to start ascending, but we won't be able to return to low Earth orbit any time soon. At least we've stopped losing altitude.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Huaxu was the one who infiltrated Gestalt, and the sub-terminal dropped this, Asimov.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Prepare to disengage from the virtual space.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "If that's the case, then let's get out of here.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "...What's going on? I can't get you to disengage. Why can't I connect with you?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Looks like a part of the full band lockdown procedure is still in effect.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Don't worry about the lockdown for now. Lee, go to the terminal in the virtual space to synchronize your data with me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Gestalt is operating normally now. So if the usual method doesn't work... I still have another way.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lee quickly approaches the terminal and begins operating it.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'm ready on this end, Asimov. Are you ready to start the handshake protocol?", 4: '1'}
{3: '*Establishing handshake protocol. Integrating signal via side link.*'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Tch... Since we can't use the main channel, it's going to take a bit longer.", 4: '2'}
{3: '*Warning: Unauthorized data flow detected. Emergency safeguard activated.*'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "...Dammit. Now that Gestalt is fully operational, it's treating us like junk data."}
{3: 'You begin to feel the virtual space around you peeling off layer by layer, revealing the underlying data.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "We're running out of time, Asimov! Hurry up! I'm struggling to keep in sync!"}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: '...Looks like we have no other choice but to "offend" Gestalt a little.'}
{3: 'You notice that the crumbling areas around you begin to halt, and some places even revert to looking like Babylonia.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "I pitted part of Gestalt's firewalls against itself, which should buy us some time."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Asimov, we've reached the minimum requirement for the disengagement procedure!"}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Then begin the disengagement sequence! But I should warn you, your M.I.N.D. might experience a "slight" deviation!'}
{3: 'Just like that, everything around you fall into darkness, just like when you first began the immersion process.'}
{3: 'Brainstem bridging link complete >>> Initiating consciousness update...'}
{3: 'Allocating memory >>> Loading virtual presence >>> Loading complete.'}
{3: 'Initiating virtual spatial retrieval with Spear of F.O.S. >>> Complete.'}
